data.name: Otherworld Legends - Penhaligon
data.detailed_description:
Fusilier - Penhaligon! This hero's non-skill attacks have a chance to mark hit enemies as vulnerable.

The beating of drums, echoes the stomping of our boots.
The blast of trumpets, prompts the bullets outta guns.
Over a thunderous roar, our bayonet shines like snow.
We are the dawn breaking over the chilly river.
And will be the last glimmer of rays for the empire.

Denting Blow：Enhance the next normal attack after the skill use. The first enemy hit by the enhanced attack will be marked as vulnerable to both melee and ranged attacks.


Trench Charge：Charge forward holding the fusil and deal multiple damages to enemies in the path. At the end of the charge, fire multiple shots.


Royal Artillery：Ask for fire support that bombards targets in the front

Regiment of Fusiliers：Summon a Royal Fusilier to fight with you. When there are 2 Royal Fusiliers in the room, the skill will trigger the volley formation that delivers a round of piercing shots. Up to 2 Royal Fusiliers can exist at one time.

data.short_description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
